info.name: Inoreader Feedly Skin
info.description: Mods Inoreader to resemble the Feedly #today and #card views. Minimally tested. Use with Light Theme for optimal results.
info.additionalInfo:
Release Notes

  • 5 Dec 2015 Like this mod but prefer the Aqua / Dark theme? Just remove #subscriptions_buttons, #sb_rp_tools and #sb_tp_search_overlay from the source.
